sentences.en: People believed it was a privilege to die for your country, but after the debacle of the war they never felt the same again.
sentences.cn: 人们曾相信为国捐躯是一种荣幸，但是经过战争的彻底失败，他们再也不这样想了。

sentences.en: Many see an opportunity in the debacle.
sentences.cn: 有很多人从崩溃中发现了机会。

sentences.en: But with the debacle would come some dividends.
sentences.cn: 但是溃败也会带来些好处。
